languages.text: "Вам позволено говорить лишь в том случае, когда вас спрашивают. Но раз Вольный Торговец так рвется высказать свое мнение — прошу, трибуналу любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

traits.locale_text: "Довольно! Вам позволено говорить лишь в том случае, когда вас спрашивают. Но раз Вольный Торговец так рвется высказать свое мнение — прошу, трибуналу любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."
languages.original_text: "Вам позволено говорить лишь в том случае, когда вас спрашивают. Но раз Вольный Торговец так рвется высказать свое мнение — прошу, трибуналу любопытно узнать, что же вы вынесли из этого допроса".

traits.locale_text: "You are only allowed to speak when someone addresses you. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from the interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are only allowed to speak when someone addresses you. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from the interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are only allowed to speak when asked. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from the interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are only allowed to speak when asked. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from the interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne parlerez que lorsque vous y êtes {mf|invité|invitée}. Mais puisque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} tient tant à faire entendre le son de sa voix, qu'il en soit ainsi. La cour est curieuse de savoir quels sont les enseignements que vous avez tirés de cet interrogatoire. »
languages.original_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne parlerez que lorsque vous y êtes {mf|invité|invitée}. Mais puisque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} tient tant à faire entendre le son de sa voix, qu'il en soit ainsi. La cour est curieuse de savoir quels sont les enseignements que vous avez tirés de cet interrogatoire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “只有询问你的时候，你才可以发言。不过，既然行商浪人这么渴望让其他人听到{mf|他|她}的声音，那又有何不可呢？整个法庭都很想知道，你从这场审判中明白了哪些事情。”
languages.original_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."

traits.locale_text: “只有允许你发言的时候，你才可以发言。不过，既然行商浪人这么渴望让其他人听到{mf|他|她}的声音，那又有何不可呢？整个法庭都很想知道，你从这场审判中明白了哪些事情。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「発言は求められた時のみ許される。だが自由開拓者が自分の意見を表明したいと言うのなら、ぜひそうしてもらおう。法廷の者はあなたがこの尋問から何を得たのか知りたいと思っている」
languages.original_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."

traits.locale_text: 「発言は求められた時のみ許される。だが自由開拓者が自分の意見を表明したいと言うのなら、ぜひそうしてもらおう。法廷の者はあなたがこの尋問から何を得たのか知りたいと思っている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht nur, wenn Euch eine Frage gestellt wird. Aber da sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unbedingt Gehör verschaffen will, dann nur zu. Das Gericht ist neugierig, was Ihr bei dieser Ermittlung herausgefunden habt."
languages.original_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht nur, wenn Ihr dazu aufgefordert werdet. Aber da sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} unbedingt Gehör verschaffen will, dann nur zu. Der Hof ist neugierig, was Ihr bei dieser Ermittlung herausgefunden habt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Hable solamente cuando se le pregunte. Pero ya que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tiene tantas ganas de hacerse oír, le concederé el gusto. A este tribunal le interesaría saber qué opina de este interrogatorio».
languages.original_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."

traits.locale_text: «Hable solamente cuando se le pregunte. Pero ya que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tiene tantas ganas de hacerse oír, le concederé el gusto. A este tribunal le interesaría saber qué opina de este testimonio».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yalnızca sana soru sorulduğu zaman konuşma iznin var. Gelgelelim madem Hür Tacir sesinin duyulmasına bu kadar hevesli, buyursun. Divan, bu sorgulamadan yaptığın çıkarımları dinlemek için sabırsızlanıyor."
languages.original_text: "You are only allowed to speak when questioned. But since the Rogue Trader is so eager to make {mf|his|her} voice heard, by all means do. The court is curious to know what you gleaned from this interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca sana soru sorulduğu zaman konuşma iznin var ancak madem Hür Tacir sesinin duyulması konusunda bu kadar hevesli, buyursun. Divan, bu sorgulamadan yaptığın çıkarımları dinlemek için sabırsızlanıyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
